description:
Operate your etcd cluster conveniently and efficiently; support views for multiple keys; manage leases, users, roles, and permissions.


- [New] Support deleting multiple keys based on prefix
- [New] Support more data types
- [New] Support multi-selection deletion of keys
- [New] Support memory key configuration data type
- [Improved] Optimize UI and software efficiency
- [Improved] Improve internationalization
- [Fixed] Fix the problem of creating lease
